content:
# I successfully extracted 1 iron plate from the new furnace, bringing my total in the inventory to 2 iron plates. The furnace now has 2 iron ore remaining.

# My current inventory is as follows:
# - 5 coal
# - 5 iron ore
# - 5 stone
# - 2 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# To maximize production, I can continue to smelt the remaining iron ore in the furnace. 
# I will insert the remaining 2 iron ore into the furnace along with some coal to keep it fueled.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, new_furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert additional coal for fuel
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, new_furnace, quantity=2)  # Insert remaining iron ore for smelting

# Let's check the status of the new furnace again to ensure it is processing correctly.
print(f"New Furnace status after adding resources: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the contents of the new furnace
print(f"Updated Inventory after adding resources: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after adding resources
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the current entities on the map
